Text:
I hope someone can upload David Letterman in 720p. That would be great.
Thanks.

could you upload episodes of TLC's NY Ink, please? its a new reality show and its on the second ep. already
most people outside USA dont have TLC channel and would love to watch the show :)
Thanks, eztv.

I LOVeENeil Patrick Harris!  I'll watch him on any show he appears on.  In this Letterman episode Letterman asks him about NPH's new twins, how they were conceived and more.  NPH shows fotos of the twins dressed for Easter - Cinco De Mayo - so incredibly funny!  NPH is one of the best openly gay mentors the LGBT community could ask for.  I'm straight and I love the guy!
